data.name: Nature Escapes
data.detailed_description:
Experience Nature's wild beauty in stunning locales from across the globe, while decorating your garden with plants and flowers you've never seen before!

24 chapters of nature fun!
Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
Fun facts about fun plants!
Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
Decorate your very own garden!
data.about_the_game:
Experience Nature's wild beauty in stunning locales from across the globe, while decorating your garden with plants and flowers you've never seen before!

24 chapters of nature fun!
Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
Fun facts about fun plants!
Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
Decorate your very own garden!
data.short_description: et ready to get lost in the wild beauty of Nature with this hidden object game! Let Nature Escapes take you on a t trip to handcrafted snapshots of untamed wonder, and decorate your very own garden until it becomes a bouquet of beautiful plants and flowers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 64-bit 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core) Quad Core Recommended CPU Speed: 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: Radeon HD2600, Geforce 8600, with 512 MB VRam or better
